Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.logic.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
A class to store the players of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int id, String name, int money, int position, List<Tile> tiles, boolean jailed, Color pieceColor, boolean lost)
      Constructor for the Player class
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the player
      name - - the name of the player
      money - - the amount of money the player has
      position - - the position of the player on the board
      tiles - - the tiles owned by the player
      jailed - - whether the player is in jail
      pieceColor - - the color of the player's piece
      lost - - whether the player has lost the game
